name: Guardian Fall Protection Roofing Kit
description: All-in-one OSHA-compliant fall protection kit built for roofing contractors tackling steep pitches.
target_audience_match: Ideal for solo roofers or small crews who want a reliable, budget-friendly kit that passes inspections every time.

name: Werner Roofing Safety System
description: A premium fall protection setup trusted by pros and major contractors alike.
target_audience_match: Perfect for teams that need durability and comfort during long hours on steep or complex roofs.

name: Malta Dynamics Warthog Roofing Kit
description: Tough, field-tested gear with a military-grade harness — built for harsh jobsite conditions.
target_audience_match: Designed for roofers who work in extreme heat, cold, or debris-heavy environments and can't afford equipment failure.

name: 3M DBI-SALA Roofer’s Compliance Kit
description: Trusted brand with advanced safety features for high-risk residential and commercial roofing.
target_audience_match: Best for licensed contractors juggling multiple jobs who need gear that stands up to inspections every time.

name: SafeWaze Roofer's Basic Fall Kit
description: Affordable and compact — great for quick jobs or starter crews.
target_audience_match: A smart pick for new roofers, weekend warriors, or businesses looking to outfit part-time teams quickly.
